name: Nokian Tyres Plc
membership:
- European Tyre and Rubber Manufacturers' Association (ETRMA)
- European Tyre and Rim Technical Organisation (ETRTO)
goal: To develop and manufacture innovative, safe and high quality tyres and to positively contribute to the mobility and well-being of its customers and the society.
euInitiatives: Transport policy in overall and road safety initiatives in particular. Energy efficiency policy in overall and tyre fuel efficiency initiative in particular. Industrial policy. Internal market policy. Trade policy in overall and technical harmonisation and market access in particular.
